keys: comprensión de lectura y que escucha

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">At the Café 2</string>
            <string language="en">At the Café 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beim Café 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chez le Café 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">No Café 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Al Café 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στο Cafι 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En el Café 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Here you can read and listen to a dialogue between two friends who are having something to eat at a café. The dialogue is followed by questions on the content.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
            <string language="en">Here you can read and listen to a dialogue between two friends who åre having something to eat at a cafe. The dialogue is followed by questions on the content. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">food</string>
            <string language="sv">reading and listening comprehension</string>
            <string language="sv">café</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">food</string>
            <string language="en">reading and listening comprehension</string>
            <string language="en">cafe</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier können Sie zu einem Dialog zwischen zwei 
Freunden lesen und hören, die åre, das etwas hat, an einem Kaffee zu
essen. Der Dialog wird von den Fragen über den Inhalt gefolgt. 
Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 2 - 
wieviel ist es?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voici que vous pouvez lire et écouter un dialogue 
entre deux amis qui åre ayant quelque chose manger à un café. 
Le dialogue est suivi des questions sur le contenu. Safir 
- l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - module 2 - combien 
coûte-t-il ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui você pode ler e escutar um diálogo entre 
dois amigos que åre que tem algo comer em um café. O diálogo 
é seguido por perguntas no índice. Safir - vida do inglês e 
de funcionamento para novatos - módulo 2 - quanto é ele?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui potete leggere ed ascoltare un dialogo fra due 
amici che åre che ha qualcosa mangiare ad un caffè. Il dialogo
è seguito dalle domande sul soddisfare. Safir - inglese e vita 
attiva per i principianti - modulo 2 - quanto è esso?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ μπορείτε να διαβάσετε και να ακούσετε ένα 
διαλογικό παράθυρο μεταξύ δύο φίλων που εre έχοντας κάτι 
που τρώει σε έναν καφέ. Το διαλογικό παράθυρο ακολουθείται
από τις ερωτήσεις στο περιεχόμενο. Safir - αγγλική και 
οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 2 - πόσο 
είναι αυτή;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí usted puede leer y escuchar un diálogo entre
dos amigos que åre que tiene algo comer en un café. El 
diálogo es seguido por preguntas sobre el contenido. ¿Safir - 
inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo 2 - cuánto es
él?</string>
          </description>
